modName: Ornate Steel Weapons Texture - Resource by Phil
descriptionHtml:
Ornate Steel Weapons Texture Resource
-------------------------------------

The textures are now implemented in the game!

Check out my mod \"Phils Textures Standalone\" where I put my texture resources into the game.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12420]Phils Textures Standalone[/url]

Author
------
PhilSchmidheiny

This is a texture resource of the steel weapons to give them a more noble look.
The textures will be featured in my Total Conversion in the distant future and I thought other modders could use them for their own mods.

NOTE: This is a resource, meaning that this file does not add anything to the game!

If you want the weapons to replace the vanilla weapons just remove the \"02\"-suffix on every texture.

Do whatever you like with the texture but please credit me.

Content
-------

Ornate texture of the following items:

-Steel Sword
-Steel Waraxe
-Steel Mace
-Steel Greatsword
-Steel Battleaxe
-Steel Warhammer
-Hunting Bow
-Steel Arrows
-Steel Dagger
-Scabbards

Texture size
------------

4k (everything but Scabbard & Arrows)
1k (Scabbards & Arrows)

All textures have the same size as the Bethesda HiRes TexturePack.
author: PhilSchmidheiny
